title: LEAGUE CLIENT DECIDES TO DOWNLOAD 2 GB AFTER PATCH 7.15
body: what is this and why did it happen after i finished patching. this is not the first occasion

replies.body: no i guess its something else .... its 4 gb download first part only ... like its downloading the whole game again
Glad I'm not the only one... game patched and then said it had to download more and the ETA was 3 hours
When games update with something new, it's only natural that you'll have to download those new files. Have you played since the new champion's release?
i was on version 7.14 - and same for me

Hey ThyMaster6Crowly ,

We've taken a look and these numbers are false - there's some file moves and deletions in there which will happen super quick, but the patcher is considering them part of the patch. As such, despite the large filesize - the download size is much smaller (and it'll patch much quicker than you expect!)

It is patch day, so there's going to be some new files that will need to update.  There is also a chance that some game files might require repairs in case of detected corruption.  Just be sure that your network is able to reach the patching server to get your file up to date as fast as it can.  If you run into any snags, make sure to run through the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to clear up blocks along the way.
